title: Woman Medium Light Skin Tone Beard
alsoKnownAs: Woman with Beard Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A woman with a medium-light skin tone and a beard. This emoji represents women who have beards, challenging traditional gender norms and celebrating diverse identities.
apple_vendor_description: This unique emoji, as designed for Apple devices, presents a woman with a medium-light skin tone sporting a well-defined beard. The rendering showcases Apple‚Äôs hallmark glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients, giving the facial features a realistic and approachable appearance. Its inclusion on Apple devices signifies the diverse spectrum of gender identity and expression, offering a powerful symbol of self-acceptance and visibility.
